message:
Game Master+ V2.4 - Update
# Dotsrpg For suggestions and bugs/problems

Bug Fixes: 
- No fixes, the bot seemed fine :D

New Changes:
- Added a Marksmanship stat and more skill points to compensate for it (48 points total. 8 points per stat.)
- Removed the strict game master code (I didn’t like it and it seemed to do nothing.)
- Added a few more common questions for the ai to awnser.
- Added a shortcut to make the ai act like the people people (Experimental because I  TTsuck at prompting it to do that)
- Added more tier descriptions for what the normal statistics of them are. (could need balancing but i lazy :eepy:)

Link: https://perchance.org/ai-character-chat?data=Game_Master+_V2.4~762c2af8fa2b244417631b785acd1e60.gz
